Wisdom: اسْتُرْ عَوْرَةَ أَخِيكَ لِمَا تَعْلَمُهُ فِيكَ
enWisdom: Hide the flaw of your brother because of what you know is in yourself
Forgive the mistake of your friend, [and] your enemy will consider you to be virtuous

Wisdom: إِنَّ أَخَاكَ حَقّاً مَنْ غَفَرَ زَلَّتَكَ وَسَدَّ خَلَّتَكَ وَقَبِلَ عُذْرَكَ وَسَتَرَ عَوْرَتَكَ وَنَفَى وَجَلَكَ وَحَقَّقَ أَمَلَكَ
enWisdom: The one who journeys in search of a righteous brother journeys the farthest

Wisdom: ثَمَرَةُ الْأُخُوَّةِ حِفْظُ الْغَيْبِ وَإِهْدَاءُ الْعَيْبِ
enWisdom: The fruit of brotherhood is [in] protecting [the reputation of one’s brother in] his absence and presenting his faults to him [so that he may correct himself]

Wisdom: مِنْ أَشْرَفِ أَفْعَالِ الْكَرِيمِ تَغَافُلُهُ عَمَّا يَعْلَمُ
enWisdom: One of the most honourable actions of the noble-minded person is feigning inattention towards that which he knows

Wisdom: لَا يَكُونُ الصَّدِيقُ صَدِيقاً حَتَّى يَحْفَظَ أَخَاهُ فِي غَيْبَتِهِ وَنَكْبَتِهِ وَوَفَاتِهِ
enWisdom: There is no good in a stingy [or suspicious] friend

Wisdom: يَا عَبْدَ اللَّهِ لَا تَعْجَلْ فِي عَيْبِ عَبْدٍ بِذَنْبِهِ فَلَعَلَّهُ مَغْفُورٌ لَهُ وَلَا تَأْمَنْ عَلَى نَفْسِكَ صَغِيرَ مَعْصِيَةٍ فَلَعَلَّكَ مُعَذَّبٌ عَلَيْهَا
enWisdom: Servant of Allah, do not make haste in [exposing] the fault of a servant, for he may have been forgiven for it, and do not count yourself safe from [your] small sins as you might be punished for them
Making false accusations is the first step in cutting off ties
False accusation is the messenger of severance of ties

Wisdom: ذَوُو الْعُيُوبِ يُحِبُّونَ إِشَاعَةَ مَعَايِبِ النَّاسِ لِيَتَّسِعَ لَهُمُ الْعُذْرُ فِي مَعَايِبِهِمْ
enWisdom: Those with faults love to spread the faults of people so that they get a greater excuse for their own faults

Wisdom: شَرُّ النَّاسِ مَنْ كَانَ مُتَتَبِّعاً لِعُيُوبِ النَّاسِ عَمْياً لِمَعَايِبِهِ [عَنْ مَعَايِبِهِ‏]
enWisdom: The worst person is one who looks for the faults of others while turning a blind eye to his own faults

Wisdom: مَنْ كَشَفَ حِجَابَ أَخِيهِ انْكَشَفَ عَوْرَاتُ بَيْتِهِ
enWisdom: Whoever exposes his brother’s veil [and reveals his flaws], the faults of his own household (or family) get exposed

Wisdom: مَنْ بَحَثَ عَنْ أَسْرَارِ غَيْرِهِ أَظْهَرَ اللَّهُ أَسْرَارَهُ
enWisdom: Whoever searches for the secrets of others, Allah uncovers his own secrets

Wisdom: مَنْ تَتَبَّعَ خَفِيَّاتِ الْعُيُوبِ حَرَّمَهُ اللَّهُ مَوَدَّاتِ الْقُلُوبِ
enWisdom: Whoever pursues the hidden flaws [of others], Allah makes the affection of the hearts forbidden to him

Wisdom: مَنْ تَتَبَّعَ عَوْرَاتِ النَّاسِ كَشَفَ اللَّهُ عَوْرَتَهُ
enWisdom: One who pursues the faults of people, Allah exposes his own faults
